description: This file sets up an AI agent with a PDF knowledge base and demonstrates querying it for Thai recipes.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base and language model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the PDF knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
